text: Juliet Dunlop (born 21 February 1972) is a Scottish freelance television journalist. ==Career== She currently works as a senior news correspondent in Scotland for ITV's breakfast programme Good Morning Britain. She used to be a presenter for BBC News and STV News. She left the BBC in 2011. She took a break from her role in news reporting to embark on a journey as an English teacher at Inveralmond Community High School, Livingston. This was short-lived and Dunlop was back in the news race. Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish journalists
title: Juliet Dunlop
